Trade/Device Name(s): MAGLUMI X3 Fully-auto chemiluminescence immunoassay analyzer
Submitter Information: Shenzhen New Industries Biomedical Engineering Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Analyzer, Chemistry (Photometric, Discrete), For Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MAGLUMI X3 Fully-auto chemiluminescence immunoassay analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MAGLUMI 25-OH Vitamin D assay and MAGLUMI X3 analyzer for quantitative determination of vitamin D in serum and plasma using chemiluminescence technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of 25-OH Vitamin D in human serum and plasma to aid assessment of vitamin D sufficiency
